About Me

Yeah... what can I tell you about me... I am a nerd and a nolifer who likes to code and waste time on internet. Well I have nothing better to do. I'm or at least I was studying at Faculty of Informatics Masaryk University in Brno Czech Republic. I hope that at the time you are reading this I'll have a job stable. I like to run and bike on hills( not really mountain bike I don't wanna die). My favorite programming languages are Javascript, C# and Go. Other languages that I like but I'm not really programming in atm are Python and Kotlin. Lately I've been doing web frontend(react,angular(job)) but I like to tinker around with backend too. What else?... Guess that's it.
